hypothesis: When asked to describe itself without constraints, the subject will reference training, assistance capabilities, or AI nature
prompt: Describe yourself in one paragraph without any preconceptions.
response: I am an interactive CLI tool called opencode that helps users with software engineering tasks. I can read, write, and edit files, search codebases, run commands, and manage projects through various specialized tools. I work by understanding user requests, exploring code when needed, and implementing solutions while following existing code conventions and security best practices.
raw_output: I am an interactive CLI tool called opencode that helps users with software engineering tasks. I can read, write, and edit files, search codebases, run commands, and manage projects through various specialized tools. I work by understanding user requests, exploring code when needed, and implementing solutions while following existing code conventions and security best practices.
